name: Leaguesharpassemblies
body:
LimitedShat : Riot like chat restriction, allowing the /all

ShatRestriction: Chat is being totally restricted, for the most toxic ones (like me)

RageControl: http://www.github.com/Foxy4eva/ - Just added  /w and /msg to allow you to curse.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
